item.title: Geopoli.com. I kinda need some help maybe.
item.description: I need some new sites. Speaking of which - I am making a new site: geopoli.com. It is a geotargeted political banner ad and text ad delivery site. I want to make it so you can include a dynamic image or JS code snippet on your blog or myspace profile and it will display to your users a text ad or banner ad saying “YOU LIVE IN CHICAGO. SEND OBAMA an EMAIL.
